Class TownyUtil

    • mergeTowns

      public boolean mergeTowns(com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.object.Town prevailingTown, com.palmergames.bukkit.towny.object.Town succumbingTown)
      Merge two towns using Towny API
      Parameters:
      prevailingTown - town that absorbs succumbingTown
      succumbingTown - town to be deleted and absorbed by prevailingTown
      Returns:
      true if success, else false
